propositions.text: The speaker wants to make the listener the same as their mother and themselves, possessing the same destiny.
The listener resists this.
The speaker insists.
The listener questions 'why'.
The speaker states 'because you are my child'.
The listener expresses unwillingness.
The speaker asks if the listener dislikes the situation.
The listener expresses uncertainty.
The speaker questions the listener's uncertainty.
The listener expresses fear.
The speaker asks what the listener fears.
The listener fears pain.
The speaker claims the listener likes it.
The listener denies it.
The speaker questions the denial.
The listener insists they do not want it.
The speaker points out the mother's similar experience and current fate.
The listener expresses unwillingness again.
The speaker asks what the listener wants instead.
The listener wants a different destiny from their mother.
The speaker asks 'why' the listener wants this.
The listener reiterates unwillingness.
The speaker asks 'because what?'.
The listener states they want to live.
The speaker repeats the claim that the listener likes it.
The listener denies it again.
The listener insists they do not want it.
The speaker asks what the listener wants.
The listener wants to be different from the speaker.
The speaker repeats the claim that the listener likes it.
The listener denies it again.
The listener insists they do not want it.
The speaker asks what the listener wants.
The listener wants to be different from the speaker.

concepts.name: Destiny
concepts.context: The speaker wants the listener to have the same destiny as themselves and their mother, while the listener desires a different destiny.

concepts.name: Mother
concepts.context: The listener's mother is used as an example of someone who endured a similar experience and now shares the same destiny.

concepts.name: Child
concepts.context: The speaker justifies their actions by stating the listener is their child.

concepts.name: Fear
concepts.context: The listener expresses fear, specifically of pain.

concepts.name: Pain
concepts.context: The listener's fear is explicitly stated as being of pain.

concepts.name: Love/Like
concepts.context: The speaker repeatedly claims the listener likes or loves the situation, which the listener consistently denies.

concepts.name: Will/Desire
concepts.context: The core of the dialogue revolves around the listener's unwillingness and desire for a different path, contrasting with the speaker's imposed will.

concepts.name: Difference
concepts.context: The listener's ultimate desire is to be different from both their mother and the speaker.

concepts.name: Survival
concepts.context: The listener states their desire to live as a reason for wanting a different fate.

hierarchy.structure: The document presents a dialogue between two characters, one asserting control and imposing a shared destiny, and the other expressing resistance, fear, and a desire for individuality and a different future. The structure is a back-and-forth exchange, emphasizing a conflict of wills and desires.
